## Overview

```{=html}
<script type="module">
await globalThis.webR.evalRVoid(`
download.file(
  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/louisahsmith/intro-to-R-2023/main/data/nlsy_cc.csv',
  'nlsy_cc.csv'
)

webr::install(c("ggplot2", "dplyr", "readr", "forcats"))

library(ggplot2)
nlsy <- readr::read_csv("nlsy_cc.csv") |> 
  dplyr::mutate(eyesight_cat = factor(eyesight, labels = c("Excellent", "Very Good",
               "Good", "Fair", "Poor")),
    glasses_cat = factor(glasses, labels = c("Doesn't wear glasses",
                     "Wears glasses/contacts")),
    race_eth_cat = forcats::fct_recode(as.character(race_eth),
    "Hispanic" = "1",
    "Black" = "2",
    "Non-Black, Non-Hispanic" = "3"),
    sex_cat = factor(sex, labels = c("Male", "Female"))) |> 
  dplyr::select(id, samp, sex_cat, race_eth_cat, dplyr::everything())
`)
</script>	
```

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
ggplot(data = nlsy, aes(x = eyesight_cat, 
                        fill = eyesight_cat)) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(glasses_cat)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Spectral",
                    direction = -1) +
  scale_x_discrete(breaks = c("Excellent", 
                              "Good", "Poor"),
                   name = "Eyesight quality") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        axis.text.x = element_text(
          angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust = 1)) +
  labs(title = "Eyesight in NLSY",
       y = NULL) +
  coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE)
```
